news.details: Version 387: Changes: - Improved Splash Screen. - Updated 1.5x Turbo mode with pitch shifting. - Fixed visual issues with the Leafblower Trombone. - Fixed Menu Music setting not saving between sessions. - Swapped 'Old Timey Toots' and 'Its a Bop' within the Campaign. - Fixed minor screen flashing on start-up. - Fixed the inability to pause at the very beginning of a level. - Fixed Active Stars within the Song List UI being squished on first open. - Fixed turbo mode lead-in stutter on the start of some songs. - Changes to Challenges within SkaBIRD and Jarabe Tapatío (Mexican Hat Dance). - Improved performance within the Winter Environment. - Fixed bug where Mozzarbella Trombone will be unlocked Twice as it was marked as a preorder trombone. - Fixed issue where your achieved Letter Rank can go down if you play a level from Simplified and again in Original.

Version 383: Changes: - Fixed issue where sometimes only a limited amount of a users custom songs would appear on the song list. - Pause screen no longer comes up in free improv, instead going straight to the main menu. - New winter environment. Bug Fixes: - Fixed being able to grab pen/spray cans with the opposite hand while you're holding them, messing up the paint picker UI. - Updated appearance of campaign challenge progress indicators. - Improved the look of the final trombone you unlock in the campaign. - You can now move the mixed reality stage by re-centering your playspace. - Adjusted mixed reality note background color. - Brand new portal and higher quality environment in mixed reality. - Dynamic shadows for the main spotlight focused on the player. - New spray can models in trombone customization. - New textured spray can which you can use to recolor a trombone without changing the actual texture. - Improvements to how notes are synchronized with the music. - Notes now scroll in before the song starts instead of being present right when the curtains open.
